title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 463.5 - Medical services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 463.5 - Medical services

State Regulations

Upon oral or written request, medical services shall be
provided promptly, within 30 days of the request, to eligible persons. (a) Medical services means advice and
services given to eligible persons desiring medical family-planning services
under the medical assistance program from resources of their choice, including
licensed family-planning centers, clinics or private physicians. (b) Medical family-planning services shall
include diagnosis, treatment, drugs, supplies, and related counseling which are
furnished or prescribed by or under the supervision of a physician. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
463.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
